Subject: Battle at CF
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Someone post for Condor.  Preferably Airly.)

Vehement/Reflector/Unicron/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
Groove/Streetwise:




"After the heathen!" Vehement yelled, ignoring shots that struck him as he 
jumped in the air, taking off at a surprising speed, matching his with FZ.  
He raised both hands that were now cannons, firing two energy-signature 
seeking missiles from each.

---

Reflector took off threw the air, the smaller bot being faster then his 
Brotherhood counterparts.  He raised his wrist cannon, firing off ten rapid 
laser bolts at FZ.

---

Unicron fired two optic blasts with a chuckle on an intercept path with the 
missiles, continuing pursuit with a speed just a little slower than FZ.  He 
raised an arm, launching two ES seeking missiles off at FZ.

---

Demon Wulf stopped, transforming to biped mode and breathing in the smell of 
destruction.  "Continue what we were doing beforehand at the last battle my 
brethren.  Obliterate anyone who stands in our way." the Vok creation said as 
he raised a sword, the blade of the sword launching out as missile off at the 
CF.

---

Flesh Ripper transformed to biped mode, two orbs with grenade like effects 
being thrown at the CF's shields.

---

Dark Claw armed the missile launcher erected into his 'vehicle' mode.  When 
he got a target lock he launched two missiles off at the Cybertronian Fire.

---

Groove came out of the CF followed by Streetwise, firing off three blasts 
from his photon pistol at Dark Claw.

---

Streetwise transformed to his police car mode and drove full speed for Flesh 
Ripper.
